trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around December 1st 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm playing xbox when something in my head tells me to look out the window and point and record.. I see this bright intense light. I know for a fact it can't be a plane or helicopter because of the location.. I'm filming the bright light when it just disappears. 10 min later, another ball or light glides into view and then simply disappears.. Very odd. This night was very intense with air traffic and weird activity.. It did not duck behind a building.. The only building in site is that tall condo building and it vanishes before it passes by it... Another person downtown also caught the odd light on film vanishing... 120109 NYC v456
Summary: Odd light vanishes into thin air over NYC
